songs.title: About “You’re My Only Shorty”
songs.lyrics:
[Demi Lovato talking about "You're My Only Shorty"]
"You're My Only Shorty" is a song that was produced by Rock Mafia, who I loved working with, and actually Iyaz is on the song too. So when I first heard the song with Iyaz's voice, I Iike, freaked out and was so excited, and played it to my little sister and my whole family and it's just a really fun catchy song, and I love it, and I hope you do too.
